text.name: system_description
text.text: The VTech CreatiVision is a hybrid of computer and console. It is similar in concept to computers such as the APF Imagination, the VideoBrain Family, and to a lesser extent the Intellivision and the Coleco Adam, each of which anticipated the trend for video game consoles to become more and more like entry-level computers.
